venue.name: Center for Digital Imaging Arts at Boston University

item.description:
June 23: Big Shots Photo

When: June 23, 2011
Time: 6:30 p.m.
Where: Studio C at 274 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
RSVP: events@cdiabu.com

Please join us as BUCDIA welcomes Big Shot Eric Roth!

Eric Roth has been capturing life through a lens for over 30 years. His lens has guided him on local, national and international journeys. He is a photographer specializing in high level interiors. He is fascinated by how people create a stimulating living space. He has collaborated with many designers, architects, craftsmen, and artists for books and magazines worldwide. He also publishes books on his own, and he regularly exhibits his fine art photography.

His clients include: Jordans Furniture, Thomas Moser, Circle Furniture, Bose Corporation, LL Bean, Cape Cod Home, New England Home, House Beautiful, and many more.
Website: www.ericrothphoto.com

Thanks,

: : : : : :
Ms. Urvi Modh Fontenot
Events/Workshop Manager
Practicum Manager
Boston University Center for Digital Imaging Arts
274 Moody Street
Waltham, MA 02453
781-209-1700
781-209-0018 (fax)
umodh@cdiabu.com

www.cdiabu.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Free Photo Lecture: BUCDIA welcomes Big Shot Eric Roth
